dmca.title: How much longer is this going to take?
dmca.body:
Dear Mr. Bristow:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Matthew Bristow [mailto:matthewbristow@yahoo.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, February 28, 2007 4:28 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: How much longer is this going to take? 

http://shoutfile.com/v/sKDrFAKP/How_Cocaine_Is_Made

Please remove this clip as soon as possible. This is
taking an unreasonable amount of time. All the other
video clip sites I contacted removed it within a
couple of days. 

The clip has my name and this email near the end of
it, as I said when I first contacted you. Here is my
report on BBC newsnight, which contains some of the
same material. 

http://news.bbc.co.uk/player/nol/newsid_6270000/newsid_6277200/6277261.s
tm?bw=bb&mp=rm

Please remove it as soon as possible.

Yours faithfully,


Matthew Bristow
